text: Yalli fayya iyyeeh saytunnooweh kaa ceele waytaamak, usuk diggah cakÄ·i amoytay digaalaa kee galto gabat kak tani kinni, kaadu Nabiyow wacyih kol oobisne Qhuraan jibriil kol yakriye waqdi kiryat kak maqataatakin usuk gaba kalak naharat, kaadu yi-Rabbow atu yoo barisseemit ixxiga yoh osis ixxic kaak iyye Yalli
